sentence.Network_en: Any entry arriving after the closing date will not be considered.
sentence.Network_cn: 截止日期之后报名参赛的人将不予考虑。

sentence.Network_en: They almost won the match in the closing minutes.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后几分钟的时候他们差一点赢了这场比赛。

sentence.Network_en: Within minutes she was outside, closing her bedroom door tight behind her.
sentence.Network_cn: 不出几分钟，她就出去了，并把卧室的门紧紧带上了。

list.abs: 一个封闭(closed)的类可以用作基类，但是它的行为已经封闭，而且不受派生类的干扰。从本质上讲，封闭的基类将禁止派生类访问其 …
...泛在华南地区华北地区上海加锋电子最常见的开关是让人操作的机电设备，其中有一个或数个电子接点。接点的“闭合”（closed）表示电子接点导通，允许电流流过；开关的“开路”（open）表示电子接点不导通形成开路，不允许电流流过.

entry.def: The closing part of an activity or period of time is the final part of it.

example.ex: He entered RAF service in the closing stages of the war...
example.tran: 战争快要结束的时候，他加入了英国皇家空军。

example.ex: They almost won the match in the closing minutes...
example.tran: 最后几分钟的时候他们差一点赢了这场比赛。

means.word_mean: 2. the last section of a communication;
3. approaching a particular destination; a coming closer; a narrowing of a gap;

sentences.sentence: "the ship's rapid rate of closing gave them little time to avoid a collision"
"they regretted the closure of the day care center"
